TopicTitle: Can't move or place parts after entering VAB after a couple launches

Articles.Content: After a couple flights the A button on the Xbox controller doesn't select parts in the VAB. The only way around is to restart the game, very annoying. Is there any other way to fix this?

3 hours ago, Brando said:

After a couple flights the A button on the Xbox controller doesn't select parts in the VAB. The only way around is to restart the game, very annoying. Is there any other way to fix this?

So I found a workaround. Once the ship has landed and you are ready to recover, instead of pressing start and going to recover, go to the tracking station. You can recover there and still be able to edit your ship for the next launch.
